articles.content: Akash Singh won Colors talent show Hunarbaaz – Desh Ki Shaan on Sunday. The dancer beat Yo Highness, Band Rocknama, Band Harmony of the Pines, Sanchita and Shubhroto, Ustaad Anirban and Sukhdeb to ta… [+2118 chars]

articles.title: Anupam Kher shares photos highlighting his physical transformation. See pic - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Anupam Kher first shared a picture of his physical transformation last year on his 67th birthday. He has now shared with his fans all the progress he has made since then.
articles.content: On Sunday, actor Anupam Kher shared a picture of himself, highlighting his physical transformation. Last month, on his 67th birthday, Anupam flaunted his fit body, as he shared a photo from his gym. … [+2067 chars]

articles.description: According to an official statement, their upcoming studio album will release on June 10.

articles.title: India's Got Talent 9 winners are beatboxer Divyansh and flautist Manuraj - India Today
articles.description: The winners of India's Got Talent 9 are beatboxer Divyansh and flautist Manuraj. Ishita Vishwakarma was the first runner-up.
